original_text: And it shall come to pass, when it is seen that Moab is weary on the high place, that he shall come to his sanctuary to pray; but he shall not prevail.
korean_text: 모압이 그 산당에서 피곤하도록 봉사하며 자기 성소에 나아가서 기도할지라도 소용없으리로다

sentences.original_text: And it shall come to pass
that Moab is weary on the high place
that he shall come to his sanctuary to pray
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 자신의 성소에 와서 기도할 것이다
